game_description: If you are looking for a virtual reality experience where your coordination and stamina are challenged, then ShotgunSports is for you. Test your skill and compete with your friends in three olympics shooting disciplines: Skeet, Trap and Duble Trap. Exciting matches and different scenarios are waiting for you. So what are you waiting for? Grab your Shotgun, break new records and challenge your friends. Much more is there to be discovered.
